revision.text:
This is a property of type [[Has type::URL]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::SSO]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "Standard" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Standard
|StandardSSO=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" |+ Direct Attributes ! SSO | [[Standard has SSO::{{{StandardSSO|}}}]] |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Derived Attributes ! Versions of standard | {{#ask:[[Standard version is instance of::{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]]|format=list}} |} [[Category:Standards]]

This is the "Standard" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Standard}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|Standard}}} {| class="formtable" ! StandardSSO: | {{{field|StandardSSO|input type=combobox|values from category=SSOs}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::Standard]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::URL]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Text]].
The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Current]] * [[Allows value::Candidate]] * [[Allows value::Obsolete]]
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "StandardVersion" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{StandardVersion
|Standard=
|Status=
|DocumentationURL=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" |+ Direct Attributes ! Instance of standard | [[Standard version is instance of::{{{Standard|}}}]] |- ! Status | [[Standard version status::{{{Status|}}}]] |- ! Documentation URL | {{#arraymap:{{{DocumentationURL|}}}|,|x|[[Standard version documentation URL::x]]}} |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Derived Attributes ! System versions implementing | {{#ask: [[Category:System Versions]] [[System version implements::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=table | mainlabel=Name }} |- ! Dependency versions implementing | {{#ask: [[Category:Dependency Versions]] [[Dependency version implements::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=table | mainlabel=Name }} |} [[Category:Standard Versions]]

This is the "StandardVersion" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=StandardVersion}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|StandardVersion}}} {| class="formtable" ! Standard: | {{{field|Standard|input type=combobox|values from category=Standards}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|Status}}} |- ! DocumentationURL: | {{{field|DocumentationURL}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

{{Vendor
|Country=
|URL=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" |+ Direct Attributes ! Country | [[Vendor from country::{{{Country|}}}]] |- ! URL | [[Vendor has URL::{{{URL|}}}]] |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Derived Attributes ! System Versions | {{#ask: [[Category:System Versions]] [[System version is from vendor::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=table | mainlabel=Name }} |} [[Category:Vendors]]

This is the "Vendor" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Vendor}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|Vendor}}} {| class="formtable" ! Country: | {{{field|Country}}} |- ! URL: | {{{field|URL}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "License" template. It should be called in the following format:

|OSI approved=
|Commercial=
|URL=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" |+ Direct Attributes ! OSI approved | [[License is OSI approved::{{{OSI approved|}}}]] |- ! Is commercial? | [[License is commercial::{{{Commercial|}}}]] |- ! URL to license text | [[License is described on URL::{{{URL|}}}]] |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Derived Attributes ! Versions | {{#ask: [[Category:License Versions]] [[Is version of license::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=table | mainlabel=Name }} |} [[Category:Licenses]]

This is the "License" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=License}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|License}}} {| class="formtable" ! OSI approved: | {{{field|OSI approved}}} |- ! Commercial: | {{{field|Commercial}}} |- ! URL: | {{{field|URL}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

|Parent=
|Steward=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" |+ Direct Attributes ! Parent (if any) | [[Parent organizational unit::{{{Parent|}}}]] |- ! Steward | [[Organizational unit steward::{{{Steward|}}}]] |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Indirect Attributes ! Uses deployed systems | {{#ask: [[Category:Deployed System Versions]] [[Organizational unit served::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=table | mainlabel=Name }} |} [[Category:Organizational Units]]

This is the "OrganizationalUnit" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=OrganizationalUnit}} [[Category:Simularch]]

Steward: | {{{field|Steward|values from category=Component Stewards|input type=combobox}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

Operating System | [[Server OS::{{{OS|}}}]] |- ! Steward | [[Server steward::{{{Steward|}}}]] |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Derived Attributes ! HLBA Component | {{#arraymap:{{{HLBAComponent|}}}|,|x|[[HLBA component::x]]}} |} {| class="wikitable" |+Contents ! Contains systems | {{#ask: [[Category:Systems]] [[System is member of BA component::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | output=table }} |} {{#set:BA component has number of systems={{#ask: [[Category:Systems]] [[System is member of BA component::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=count}} }} [[Category:BA Components]]

page.title: Property:System is member of BA component

revision.text:
This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::BAComponent]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "System" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{System
|BAComponent=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" |+ Direct Attributes ! BA Component | [[System is member of BA component::{{{BAComponent|}}}]] |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Derived Attributes ! Versions | {{#ask: [[Category:System Versions]] [[Is version of system::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=table}} |} [[Has number of system versions::{{#ask: [[Category:System Versions]] [[Is version of system::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=count}}| ]] [[Category:Systems]]

This is the "System" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=System}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|System}}} {| class="formtable" ! BAComponent: | {{{field|BAComponent|input type=combobox|values from category=BA Components}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "DeployedSystemVersion" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{DeployedSystemVersion
|SystemVersion=
|InfrastructureFacility=
|OrganizationalUnit=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! System Version | [[System version deployed::{{{SystemVersion|}}}]] |- ! Infrastructure Facility | {{#arraymap:{{{InfrastructureFacility|}}}|,|x|[[Infrastructure facility used::x]]}} |- ! Organizational Unit | {{#arraymap:{{{OrganizationalUnit|}}}|,|x|[[Organizational unit served::x]]}} |} {{#set: Deployed system version is latest={{#show: {{#show: {{FULLPAGENAME}} | ?System version deployed | link=none }} | ?System version is latest}} }} {{#set: Deployed system version infrastructure facility tenancy={{#ask: [[Category:Deployed System Versions]] [[Infrastructure facility used::{{{InfrastructureFacility}}}]] | format=count}} }} {{#set: Deployed system version serves how many org units={{#ask: [[Category:Organizational Units]] [[-Organizational unit served::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |format=count}} }} [[Category:Deployed System Versions]]

This is the "DeployedSystemVersion" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=DeployedSystemVersion}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|DeployedSystemVersion}}} {| class="formtable" ! SystemVersion: | {{{field|SystemVersion|input type=combobox|values from category=System Versions}}} |- ! InfrastructureFacility: | {{{field|InfrastructureFacility|values from category=Infrastructure Facilities}}} |- ! OrganizationalUnit: | {{{field|OrganizationalUnit|values from category=Organizational Units}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is the "SystemVersion" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{SystemVersion
|System=
|Version=
|Precedent=
|Latest=
|License=
|Date=
|Documentation=
|Source=
|Dependencies=
|Vendor=
|Implements=
|Steward=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" |+ Direct Attributes ! System | [[Is version of system::{{{System|}}}]] |- ! Version Identifier | [[System version identifier::{{{Version|}}}]] |- ! Version Precedent | [[System version precedent::{{{Precedent|}}}]] |- ! Is Latest? | [[System version is latest::{{{Latest|}}}]] |- ! License | [[System version license::{{{License|}}}]] |- ! Release Date | [[System version release date::{{{Date|}}}]] |- ! Documentation URL | [[System version documentation URL::{{{Documentation|}}}]] |- ! Source code URL | [[System version source code URL::{{{Source|}}}]] |- ! Dependencies | {{#arraymap:{{{Dependencies|}}}|,|x|[[System version dependencies::x]]}} |- ! Vendor | [[System version is from vendor::{{{Vendor|}}}]] |- ! Implemented standards | {{#arraymap:{{{Implements|}}}|,|x|[[System version implements::x]]}} |- ! Steward | [[System version steward::{{{Steward|}}}]] |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Derived Attributes ! Deployments | {{#ask: [[Category:Deployed System Versions]] [[System version deployed::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] | format=table | mainlabel=Name }} |} [[Category:System Versions]]

License: | {{{field|License|input type=combobox|values from category=License Versions}}} |- ! Date: | {{{field|Date}}} |- ! Documentation: | {{{field|Documentation}}} |- ! Source: | {{{field|Source}}} |- ! Dependencies: | {{{field|Dependencies|values from category=Dependency Versions}}} |- ! Vendor: | {{{field|Vendor|input type=combobox|values from category=Vendors}}} |- ! Implements: | {{{field|Implements|values from category=Standard Versions}}} |- !
